message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I think it's a fantastic deal and will really be valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $18,000 is my ideal price, I could be persuaded to come down to $15,000. I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I'm still not convinced that I want to pay $15,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
